Title: Development Tester
RoleDescription: Ubisoft Halifax has an opening for a Quality Control Tester. The incumbent will be charged with the creation and ongoing support of the narrative script, in-game and cinematic dialogue, and all of other game related texts and will see to the overall coherence of the narrative with team members from other crafts who are involved in the game design.
